overview: Moray has over 20 years experience in the equity markets, working for Hoare Govett, JP Morgan, Lazard and Mirabaud. He has helped advise companies on acquisitions, fund-raising, restructuring and strategy. He was instrumental in the formation of Parkwalk. He has a wealth of experience with corporate and institutional clients. Moray is an active investor, with a long history of investing in the equity markets.
